rotate_fastener_connector.description: Rotate the fastener connector to adjust the angle.

clean_fastener_connector.description: Clean the fastener connector to remove dust or any other particles.

rotate_head.description: Rotate the head to change the light direction.

clean_head.description: Clean the head to ensure light is bright and clear.

clean_lamp_base.description: Clean the lamp base to maintain its appearance and stability.

clean_whole_lamp.description: Clean the entire lamp including the base, connector, and head.
